page.title: 13Sports.
page.content: Several sports are played in the primary school. Some of these are football, netball, rugby, hockey, volleyball, badminton, potted sports and running. The younger children in school do not play all of these but the older children play all of them. The favourite sports among the youngest classes are football and chasing, the middle classes like running games and hockey, and the oldest children prefer badminton, hockey and ball games. Most sports are played outside when the weather is fine. We play on the two football pitches and the all weather blaze pitch opposite the school. In wet weather games are played in the primary school hall and the 2 gymnasiums in the secondary school.
